ValidationRule.description: Require the salary accepted be populated when stage is hired.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Hired"), OR(ISNULL( Accepted_Salary__c ), ISNULL( Candidate_Start_Date__c )), RecordTypeId = '0124w000001Yqpv')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide the accepted salary amount and candidate's start date when stage is marked Hired.
